0: Under Dan’s harsh control, the Factory Gang started growing in influence all across the Wastes, losing any resemblance to the ragtag team of criminals they once were, and turning into a well respected army of mercenary guards
16.20082: This growth did not last long, though, since one day Dan was shot and killed by an unknown mercenary
24.52016: Without a leader, the group quickly lost its new found influence and scattered in search of new job offers
